original_title: We Butter The Bread With Butter - Live at Wacken Open Air 2012
overview: Berlin weirdos We Butter the Bread with Butter performing metalcore nursery rhymes, cover versions and their very own compositions live at Wacken #23!  Songs:  01:12 Der Tag an dem die Welt unterging  05:15 Alle meine Entchen  08:19 Schlaf Kindlein, schlaf  11:10 Breekachu  13:51 Superföhn Bananendate  17:12 Remmidemmi (Deichkind Cover)  20:10 Wünsche  25:10 Der kleine Vampir  29:24 Backe backe Kuchen  32:04 World of Warcraft  34:34 Extrem
title: We Butter The Bread With Butter - Live at Wacken Open Air 2012
